Reviews.Title: Worst phone ever!!!
Reviews.Author: vex
Reviews.Content: Only 2 months of use and the screen started to give trouble flickering and the display showing distorted.I immediately contacted the seller, who indicated they would change it for me, no problem as i thought i just got a defective phone.The replacement went fine although i did not get reimbursed for the shipping even after i was told that i would have been, i was just happy to have the phone replaced, so that didn't even bother me that much.A further 4 months later the replacement decides not the power on one day and a battery icon with a red X was displayed, after some research i was able to reload the OS and it worked.1 month after, same problem with the red X, only this time i cannot reload the OS.After some more research and closer attention to the phone i discovered that the phone has:1. FAKE BATTERY2. WATER DAMAGE - the water damage indicator on the phone is red, which means it had gotten wet. (I didn't even know these phones had that indicator, until today)3. LCD SCREEN REPLACED4. RUST in the phoneI was very disgusted to make those discoveries as i had specifically ask if this replacement was a new phone and their response was "yes. we only deal in new items".This leads me to believe that the original phone i got was not at all new although the box had the seal on it.This has been my worst experience on Amazon ever.Wireovia should be banned from selling on Amazon.DO NOT purchase from the seller WIREOVIA they are deceitful.
